discourse_list.title: Attention Auction Participants: Upcoming TUSD Liquidations

content.content: Attention Auction Participants The TUSD-A vault type is being offboarded and as a part of the process, liquidations are being activated.  Recommended Actions Support was added to the auction demo keeper for liquidating TUSD Vaults here: https://github.com/makerdao/auction-demo-keeper/tree/tusd It uses the clipper callee contract that was deployed at: https://etherscan.io/address/0x8fFefE3AFd3227d1026Af42034712be05BE8a4DE  Update your keepers to include the recently deployed clipper callee contract for TUSD-A. Keepers should “do their own research” regarding liquidity sources (which may change) and implementation.   Timeline The Executive Vote planned for Friday, April 15th, 2022 will enable liquidations for TUSD-A.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
